title: Repeat Until
description:
Look through this program and then run it. Next, identify the problem with the until loop. Keep in mind, the following output is the correct program output.

0
1
2
The final value of count is 3
answer: The final value of count is 3
hint: Until loops run until the boolean expression becomes true. Modify the boolean expression so it evaluates to false until it reaches the value of 3.
